channel.title: *Lock Please
channel.description: *Lock Sorry every1, im going to work on a better project and release to you all. Richscape as a base sucked, i cant code bluur very well. switching to delta.

item.title: *Lock Please
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

staypuff:

Besides like 98% of server coding isn’t visual and cannot be displayed in pictures. Every single server pretty much has the same things in it. But it’s how it’s coded and the small added features that set servers aside from each other. What’s the point in having 60 million pictures of barrows hills floating around if you can just share the image?

becuz it lookz culer nubstick

item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

see what i’m talking about? i’m just telling you that you shouldn’t put percentages in your credits. also, bluurs already had the gs emotes and graphics, you just had to edit them server wise.
thieving was already there in deltascape.
attacking back was already there in deltascape, he just removed some monsters for training.

i’m giving you constructive criticism and all you can do is say “use your BRAINS people!”

actually i should be thanking god now because you actually didn’t use “fuck” this time.

item.title: *Lock Please
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:19, topic:348939”][quote]
100% Firemaking (fire doesnt turn to ash, didnt bother fixing. will fix in V2!)
[/quote]
that’s not 100%, that’s only 95 %
oh and if you read the rules correctly…

rules:

Percentages:
Just name the people you are crediting, don’t bother making up random percentages unless you can provide the equations on how you get these percentages.
Quote from: Projext on June 20, 2008, 10:25:32 PM

So like instead of going
Code: [Select]
10% credit to you
and 90% credits to me!
Make like a list of all the people who helped and contributed into your productions and end results which are out for release

EG:
Code: [Select]
Thug-Life
Projext
_Reforced
More Names
And don't forget anyone ;)

there you go. i’d advise you to listen to the other guys about credits because your post can get locked for this. also, using “fuck” doesn’t make you cool, it doesn’t make people like you, it just shows your true nature as an illiterate monkey who has to use “fuck, bitch, cunt, asshole” because he doesn’t know any more creative insults. you know, ones that won’t get you banned.
also

Dragon Claws 50% just need to add spec, emote, and anim

that’s like 1%, 5 if you actually added the item in item.cfg

also

Armadyl Godsword: 100%
Bandos Godsword: 99%
Zamorak Godsword: 100%
Saradomin Godsword 100% (just need to change animation to Saradomin Spec, and not Zammy 1

delta’s source already had all the godsword emotes.

you’re telling us to download deltascape’s source and see what it has.
ok.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


now look at delta’s full glory and drool all over your keyboard.

overall, i don’t think you added too much in but good job for your first release, maybe just fix credits and do a bit more work and stop blaming others for telling you to fix your credits.[/quote]
Dude, your making yourself look like a fool.
im using Bluurs client! how many times doi have to say, Sifscape is Bluurs based! look at my EDITED credits before u posted!
jeez!! and im NOT using delta client, im using source. gollee use your BRAINS people!

Read full topic
